```{r}
ggplot(summp, aes(x = Time_Point, y = mean_s, fill = Species)) +
         geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
         geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_s - se_s, ymax = mean_s + se_s),
                       width = 0.2,
                       position = position_dodge(0.9)) +
         labs(title = "",
              x = "Time Point", y = "Mean Per_Lum") +
         theme_minimal()

```

```{r}
summp <- dfs %>%
  group_by(Time_Point) %>%
  summarise(
    mean_s = mean(Per_Lum, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd_s = sd(Per_Lum, na.rm = TRUE),
    n = n(),
    se_s = sd_s / sqrt(n)
  )



ggplot(summp, aes(x = Time_Point, y = mean_s)) +
         geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
         geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = mean_s - se_s, ymax = mean_s + se_s),
                       width = 0.2,
                       position = position_dodge(0.9)) +
         labs(title = "",
              x = "Time Point", y = "Mean Per_Lum") +
         theme_minimal()
```
